BSOLTheme

https://Birmingham-and-Solihull-ICS.github.io/BSOLTheme

This package provides ggplot2 themes and colour palettes for use by Birmingham and Solihull partners.

Install Instructions

This package can be installed using devtools:

{r} devtools::install_github("Birmingham-and-Solihull-ICS/BSOLTheme")

All of the exported functions start with the prefix “bsol_theme_”, except for the ggplot2 gradient colour scale functions, which are of the form scale_*_bsol.

Usage

The packages documentation can be found here.
